title: Lesson 2
paragraph: Progress requires effort, skill, and continual learning. Achieving goals involves enhancing abilities, innovating, and refining methods. Success is marked by overcoming challenges and celebrating triumphs.

words.example: She attained her career goals last year.
He accomplished all the tasks on time.

words.meaning: to be exceptionally good at something
to introduce new ideas or methods
words.example: Companies must innovate to stay competitive.

words.meaning: to move forward or make progress
to improve by making small changes
words.example: She refined her essay before submission.
They consolidated their resources for efficiency.

words.meaning: to successfully deal with a problem
words.example: She overcame her fear of heights.
The team's triumph was celebrated widely.
